Discover spacious 3 BHK and 4 BHK independent houses and builder floors designed for modern living. Start exploring our curated collection today and secure your ideal independent home in one of Gurgaon's fastest-developing sectors near the capital border

featuresSection.heading: Exploring Diverse Rental House Options and Configurations Available in Sector 112
description: Sector 112 caters to a wide demographic seeking high-quality rental accommodation, ranging from compact independent floors ideal for professionals to expansive villas perfect for large families. These properties prioritize privacy and space, offering a distinct advantage over dense high-rise apartments.

We guide you through the typical sizes and types of independent houses and builder floors available when you choose to rent house in Sector 112 Gurgaon ensuring you find a property that perfectly fits your needs.

features.title: 4 Marla Plot
features.description: Cozy 2 BHK Independent Floors are ideal for small families or working couples prioritizing efficiency and privacy. These units maximize living space while providing the benefits of an independent address. They often include essential modern amenities like reserved parking and easy access to local transport links near the Dwarka Expressway, offering great value for money.

features.title: 6 Marla Plot
features.description: Spacious 3 BHK Builder Floors are a popular and versatile choice for growing families seeking more room. These rental houses offer substantial living areas, multiple balconies, and frequently feature dedicated utility spaces. They skillfully blend the security benefits of community living with the independence of occupying a separate, well-maintained floor.

features.title: 8 Marla Plot
features.description: Standard 3 BHK Independent House Villas provide significant lateral space, dedicated private parking, and often come with small front or back yards. They are perfect for families prioritizing green space and a suburban feel while maintaining excellent connectivity to both the professional hubs of Gurgaon and the national capital region.

features.title: 10 Marla Plot
features.description: Luxurious 4 BHK Independent Houses are designed for high-end residential living and offer expansive floor plans. These properties typically include high-quality modular kitchens, substantial storage solutions, and large master suites. They represent a prime option for discerning tenants seeking the highest standard of residential rental luxury available when you rent house in Sector 112.

features.title: 12 Marla Plot
features.description: Premium Duplex Rental Villas offer multi-level living with internal staircases, providing excellent separation between common entertainment areas and private bedrooms. This configuration is highly suitable for multi-generational families requiring distinct living zones and enhanced privacy under the comfort of one expansive roof.

features.title: 14 Marla Plot
features.description: Exclusive Large Format Villas represent the most spacious rental offerings in Sector 112, often situated within prestigious gated communities. These properties typically feature private landscaped gardens, servant quarters, and sometimes even bespoke luxury additions, offering absolute privacy and unparalleled residential grandeur right next to the Gurgaon border.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About How to Rent House in Sector 112
faqSection.description: Get clarity on the rental process, common property types, and specific logistics of high-quality independent house living in this rapidly evolving residential area of Gurgaon.

faqs.question: What types of independent houses are most popular to rent house in Sector 112
faqs.answer: The most sought-after rental options in Sector 112 are premium 3 BHK and 4 BHK independent builder floors and stand-alone houses. Builder floors are favored for their affordability and singular floor privacy within a low-rise structure. Stand-alone houses or villas offer greater exclusivity, often featuring private lawns and dedicated multi-car parking space. Demand is exceptionally high for properties with direct access to the new infrastructure connecting to Gurgaon.

faqs.question: What is the average rental price range for an independent house in Sector 112 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Rental prices vary significantly based on the house size, age of construction, and specific amenities provided. Generally, a modern 3 BHK builder floor can start from approximately INR 28,000 to INR 40,000 per month. Larger 4 BHK luxury independent villas or premium stand-alone houses often range from INR 55,000 to well over INR 85,000 per month, depending heavily on internal furnishings and plot size.

faqs.question: Is Sector 112 considered safe and suitable for families seeking to rent house
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 112 is widely considered a very safe and premium residential area, particularly favorable for families due to the nature of independent living. Many houses are situated within secure, gated communities or have dedicated security personnel. Its excellent proximity to established social infrastructure, including reputed schools and comprehensive medical facilities, further enhances its appeal as a safe and convenient location for family growth.

faqs.question: How close is Sector 112 to the Dwarka Expressway and IGI Airport Gurgaon
faqs.answer: Sector 112 boasts immediate and superb access to the Dwarka Expressway, which is one of its strongest selling points for connectivity. The travel time to the IGI Airport terminal is remarkably efficient, often taking only 20 to 30 minutes under normal traffic conditions, thanks to the newly improved road infrastructure and signal-free routes provided by the expressway.

faqs.question: Are the houses for rent typically furnished or unfurnished in this area
faqs.answer: Most independent houses available to rent house in Sector 112 are typically offered as semi-furnished. This commonly includes high-end modular kitchens, high-quality built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms, and essential light fittings and fixtures. Fully furnished, move-in-ready options are less frequent but are available, generally commanding a significant premium rental price suitable for corporate leases or expatriate tenants.

faqs.question: What are the standard lease terms when I decide to rent house in Sector 112 Gurgaon
faqs.answer: The standard residential lease term in Sector 112, consistent with the wider Gurgaon rental market, is 11 months, which is then renewable upon mutual agreement. Landlords usually require a security deposit equivalent to two or three months' rent upfront. Negotiating a two-year lease term might sometimes result in a more favorable long-term rental rate and better control over annual escalation clauses.

faqs.question: What kind of specific amenities can I expect when renting an independent villa here
faqs.answer: High-end independent villas and houses for rent in Sector 112 frequently offer premium specific amenities such as full power backup provisions, multiple private or dedicated covered parking spaces, access to meticulously landscaped private or shared gardens, and sometimes exclusive community facilities like clubhouses or recreational areas within their specific cluster.

faqs.question: How does renting an independent house compare to renting an apartment in Sector 112
faqs.answer: Renting an independent house in Sector 112 provides significantly superior privacy, substantially more personal space, and greater autonomy regarding home aesthetics or minor customizations, subject to landlord approval. While apartments offer centralized maintenance, independent houses appeal to those who prioritize less density, personalized control, and a quieter residential living experience.

faqs.question: What is the typical process for finding and finalizing a rental house in this sector
faqs.answer: The standard process involves shortlisting verified properties through a professional and trusted local broker, conducting detailed site visits to confirm condition and exact location, negotiating the final rent and precise lease terms, completing necessary tenant background verification, and finally drafting and registering the formal lease agreement to complete all legal formalities before possession.

faqs.question: Are there suitable options for pet owners looking to rent house in Sector 112
faqs.answer: Yes, finding a rental property that allows pets is generally much easier in independent houses and villas than it is within strict high-rise society apartments. Since independent houses often feature private yards or direct access to the outdoors, many landlords are more receptive to responsible pet owners. It remains crucial, however, to disclose pet ownership early during the negotiation stage.
